data.text:
Module structure and key files:

**abshdl/ (27 files)** - Core HDL IR: module.py, port.py, signal.py, expr.py, assign.py, scope.py, vector.py, const.py, instance.py, interface.py, highlvl.py (24KB - Python HDL DSL), seq.py, ifelse.py, concat.py, macro.py, loop.py, comment.py, generator.py, registers.py, mmap.py, builtin.py, sens.py

**verilog/** - codegen.py (15KB), parser.py (5KB uses TextX), module_grammar.tx
**vhdl/** - codegen.py (29KB, largest file - auto library headers, type mapping, operator conversion)
**vcd/ (14+ files)** - parser.py, streaming_parser.py (27KB), compare.py (28KB), tracker.py, event.py (20KB), efficient_storage.py, pattern.py; submodules: mixins/, trigger/, tools/, util/
**mmap/** - builder.py (18KB), ast.py (11KB, 23+ AST nodes), mmap.tx grammar
**sim/ (7 files)** - hdl.py (22KB - Python-to-HDL compiler), ports.py (8KB), simulation.py, primitives.py, state.py
**hdllib/** - aximm.py (AXI slaves), fsm.py, patterns.py; axi/ subdir
**binutils/** - instruction.py, decoder.py, function.py, passes.py; objdump.tx grammar
**patterns/** - Pattern class (hex/bin/decimal with don't-care), PatternMatcher (sequential)
**tools/** - 9 CLI tools: axi_slave_builder, fnboundary, inputgen, mmap_docgen, vcdevts, vcdhier, vcdtracker, vgc, vcdcmp
**vecgen/** - TextX DSL for test vector generation
